stories.title: ECJ orders Poland to pay daily penalty payment of one million euros

stories.text:
Many years ago I came across a website that listed different graphs of technology adoption for different software and web technlogies.

For example, one graph showing an adoption curve for CSS (e.g., plain css, sass, less, etc), another for IDEs (e.g., atom, brackets, visual, etc), and so on.

It was great, but I've since lost it.

Any idea what the site is, or similar ones?
stories.title: Ask HN: Site showing graphs of adoption for different technlogies?

stories.text:
Hi all.

I was a developer for decades, who started coding again after years of hiatus while starting a wearable tech company.

I recently began coding deeply again, and I'm enamored with the open source community.

So I'm curious -- what technologies would you build if you had extra cycles to create?
stories.title: Ask HN: What open source project would you create if you had more free time?
